text: John Law (born 1877) was a Scottish professional footballer who played as a winger for Sunderland. ==References== Category:1887 births Category:People from Dumfries Category:Scottish footballers Category:Association football wingers Category:Sunderland A.F.C. players Category:Rangers F.C. players Category:Lincoln City F.C. players Category:King's Own Scottish Borderers F.C. players Category:Gainsborough Trinity F.C. players Category:Leith Athletic F.C. players Category:Carlisle United F.C. players Category:Kilmarnock F.C. players Category:Falkirk F.C. players Category:Abercorn F.C. players Category:Queen of the South F.C. players Category:English Football League players Category:Year of death missing
title: John Law (footballer, born 1887)
